short_summary: Replacement of RCMP Detachments Fox Lake, Alberta and Montreal Lake, Saskatchewan
description: Public Services & Procurement Canada (PSPC) and Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) intends to retain the services of an Architectural firm together with multi-disciplinary team of sub consultants for the provision of services required for the replacement of RCMP detachments in Fox Lake, Alberta and Montreal Lake, Saskatchewan.
full_summary:
### Replacement of RCMP Detachments Fox Lake, Alberta and Montreal Lake, Saskatchewan

#### Classification

* **Solicited By:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Category:** Architectural engineering services
* **Project Type:** Replacement of RCMP detachments

#### Project Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invite qualified bidders to submit proposals for the replacement of RCMP detachments in Fox Lake, Alberta, and Montreal Lake, Saskatchewan. This project involves the provision of architectural engineering services required for the construction and design of new detachments.

#### Contract Details

* **Contract Number:** WS4442250348
* **Amendment Number:** 6
* **Publication Date:** February 22, 2024
* **Closing Date:** April 17, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2028

#### Requirements

* Bidders are required to provide a multi-disciplinary team including an architectural firm and sub-consultants to provide services for the design and construction of the new detachments.
* All supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by April 17, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

#### Selection Criteria

* The proposed bid will be evaluated based on the combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Trade Agreements

This contract is open to Canadian suppliers under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information

For further information on this solicitation, please contact:
* Name: Wiebe, Dallas (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [dallas.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dallas.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available
* Fax: Not available
* Address: None

#### Source of Solicitation

This solicitation can be viewed on Ariba Discovery at the following link:
